statements: SELECT * FROM students
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students
SELECT student_id, email FROM students
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students ORDER BY last_name
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id > 5 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE first_name = 'Alice' OR last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM students;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT assignment_name, due_date FROM assignments ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, age FROM students WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 25;
SELECT s.first_name, a.assignment_name FROM students s JOIN assignments a ON s.student_id = a.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY age DESC, last_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE age > 20
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE due_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT assignment_name, due_date FROM assignments JOIN students ON students.student_id = assignments.student_id
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age FROM students
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_name, deadline FROM Assignments WHERE points > 50;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade FROM Students JOIN StudentAssignments ON Students.student_id = StudentAssignments.student_id;

SELECT sa.student_id, s.student_name, sa.assignment_id, a.assignment_name, sa.grade FROM StudentAssignments sa JOIN Students s ON sa.student_id = s.student_id JOIN Assignments a ON sa.assignment_id = a.assignment_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade_level = 10;
SELECT student_id, student_name, class_id FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT assignment_name, points, deadline FROM Assignments WHERE points > 50;
SELECT student_name, assignment_name, grade FROM Students JOIN StudentAssignments ON Students.student_id = StudentAssignments.student_id WHERE grade > 70 ORDER BY grade DESC;

SELECT sa.student_id, s.student_name, sa.assignment_id, a.assignment_name, sa.grade FROM StudentAssignments sa JOIN Students s ON sa.student_id = s.student_id JOIN Assignments a ON sa.assignment_id = a.assignment_id WHERE sa.grade < 60;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM students WHERE student_age > 20 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT subject_name FROM subjects WHERE subject_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT student_name, assignment_name FROM students JOIN assignments ON students.student_id = assignments.student_id;

SELECT student_name, assignment_name, completion_status FROM students JOIN assignments ON students.student_id = assignments.student_id JOIN progress ON assignments.assignment_id = progress.assignment_id WHERE progress.completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_age FROM students ORDER BY student_age DESC;
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_due_date FROM assignments WHERE assignment_due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT subject_name FROM subjects WHERE subject_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT student_name, subject_name, completion_status FROM students JOIN progress ON students.student_id = progress.student_id JOIN subjects ON progress.subject_id = subjects.subject_id
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 70;
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_due_date FROM Assignments ORDER BY assignment_due_date DESC;
SELECT class_name, class_description FROM Classes WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, assignment_name, score_value FROM Students JOIN Assignments ON Students.student_id = Assignments.student_id JOIN Scores ON Assignments.assignment_id = Scores.assignment_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 80;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students ORDER BY student_grade DESC;
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_due_date FROM Assignments WHERE assignment_due_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT student_name, score_value FROM Students INNER JOIN Scores ON Students.student_id = Scores.assignment_id;
SELECT class_name, class_description FROM Classes;
